Train Wreck suddenly zoomed forward, avoiding the shots, his wheels making =
horrible screeching noises and eating through the ground. He was far from i=
mmobile, and although his wheels were damaged, he was still moving at some =
insane speed. Woahh's shots hit him in the rear and he swerved around. One =
of his wheels cracked as he zoomed back towards his former position and fir=
es his cannon at Hot Rod once...

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: L=
egendarynemasis@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, Ju=
ly 14, 2001 9:17 PM
  Subject: Re: Clash


  Gemini Dragon laughs from both=
 heads as it looked down at the 
  immobile Trainwreck(he has to be immobil=
e if his wheels are smashed 
  in.

  Gemini: "We are just getting warmed u=
p... Literally! Amphorbasis!"

  With that one word each head began to crac=
kle with energy as the tail 
  did as well. A second later each head sent o=
ut an energizen beam of 
  fire and liquid Nitrogen before the tail sent ou=
t a blast of 
  electricity. Each blast then combined and swirled in the ai=
r before a 
  singular massive blast flew straight down at Trainwreck. Near=
by Zero 
  Reaches methos and glares as he grabs his shoulder and spins him=
 
  around to meet his glare.

  Zero: "So we meet again... perhaps we are =
destined to clash... Let's 
  finish this!"

  With those words Zero slams =
his Energy blade into the blade of 
  Methos's energy scythe each bot pushi=
ng into their weapons to through 
  the other one off balanca.

rain Wreck's outer surface was black and his

he air and

s to crackle as the

ove a second later the clouds

massive "meched out" double headed 
  dragon around 45 
  >   feet tall des=
cends from them, its massive wings flapping wildly 
  as 18 square 
  >   l=
ike objects surround it. Both heads roar loudly and then speak 
  at the sa=
me 
  >   time their voice having an echo to it.

 "Destruction shall be dealt unto all..."

massive beast and smirks before he flys back 
  and away

reck a nice Distance. Methos who is ontop of

nwreck

=

rward and 
  unleashes a massive

he same time the left head

id Nitrogen at the wheels of the chosen
